scripts.preparefunctions: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn
scripts.emulate: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase emulators:start
scripts.deployhosting: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy --only hosting & firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deployfunctions: cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy --only functions & firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.bdeployhosting: yarn run build && cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy --only hosting & firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.bdeployfunctions: yarn run build && cd .output/server && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd ../.. && cd functions && rd /s /q node_modules && yarn && cd .. && firebase deploy --only functions & firebase deploy --only functions
